name: bob
description: Overview Bob is a tool designed to help managers scheduling employees' shifts over a period of 28 days. Bob allows users to customise the number of employees, shift types, and the number of required shifts for each day. Bob then generates a schedule that ensures coverage for all shifts, as well as eployees' wellbeing, by capping the maximum number of hours and ensuring each has a sufficient numbers of hours off work.

scripts.install: cd client && npm i . && cd ../server && npm i .

author: Boryana Mincheva
